name: ``Baby Corn Run 3D Farm Race - Real Vegetable Endless Runner Dash Racing Free by Top Crazy Games
name_original: ``Baby Corn Run 3D Farm Race - Real Vegetable Endless Runner Dash Racing Free by Top Crazy Games
description:
From the developers of the hit game Baby Corn Run, Top Crazy Games brings you Baby Corn Run 3D!

AWESOME GAME FOR ALL AGES!

Baby Corn and family are caught escaping from the Farm. Help them escape from the Farmer who wants to cook them in a nice meal. Can you do it?

Action packed with an addicting and challenging gameplay that we all love to play. Dodge obstacles, run on walls, turn tight corners and throw boomerangs at the swipe and flick of your fingers.

[Features]
-> Beautiful and Amazing 3D graphics
-> Exciting gameplay
-> Intuitive Controls
-> Unlockable corn characters
-> Upgrades to increase your score
-> Collect coins and build up your score multiplier
-> Challenge your friends and compete!

PLEASE NOTE:
Baby Corn Run 3D Farm Race - Real Vegetable Endless Runner Racing Free by Top Crazy Games is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to lock out in app purchasing.
